title: Track Analysis Pipeline
description: Stages 1-2: Per-track feature extraction and role inference (drums, bass, chords, lead, arp, pad)

title: Harmony & Song-Level Analysis
description: Stages 5-7: Key detection, chord progression inference, arpeggio analysis, section segmentation

title: Pattern Extraction & Mining
description: Stages 3-4: Bar chunking, fingerprinting, pattern mining, and deduplication

title: MIDI Ingest & Normalization
description: Stage 0: Parse MIDI files, extract tempo/time-sig maps, normalize note events to beat-based timing, extract metadata from filenames/folders
